author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The AYN Thor and AYANEO Pocket DS are today's premier dual-screen Android handhelds.  Let's do a head-to-head comparison to see which one is the best fit for you.

AYN Thor: https://tinyurl.com/ThorRGC
Impressions video: https://youtu.be/B2sUrakqWt0
Review video: https://youtu.be/DeGFRB0Mor8

AYANEO Pocket DS: https://ayaneo.com/goods/9396777746677
Impressions video: https://youtu.be/XQ4d1rzhofM
Review video: https://youtu.be/NX90e3h-XOg

Dual screen handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/SQ5xUqXgON8
